Room.Name: Bendine Marina Foyer
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the foyer outside the Bendine Aquarium at the entrance to the large Marina, home to the salt-water exhibit and the giant whale tanks.
Room.LongDescription: The Aquarium is located to the west. On the north side of the entranceway is the gigantic whale tank where various species of whales are kept to amuse children and adults alike. To the east is the Salt Water Exhibit in the Rhinestone Marina itself. The Bendine Bay is cut off from the Marina by a large, iron gate, preventing the animals in the bay from escaping and keeping the carniverous creatures of the marina out.
